title: Contact Us - Stonyfield
text: Call Us Consumer Relations 1-800-PRO-COWS (1-800-776-2697) Or, send us a message using the form at the bottom of this page! Business Inquiries: (603) 437-4040 Monday-Friday 9am-5pm ET Press Contact Press inquiries ONLY please! press@stonyfield.com Logo / Product Images Click here to download the Stonyfield logo Click here to download product line image 1 Click here to download product line image 2 Follow Us On Social Media Mail Stonyfield Farm 10 Burton Drive Londonderry, NH 03053 Donation Requests Looking for support or yogurt for an event? Start here. Wholesale Inquiries Ready to do business with us? Let’s get started. Influencer/Blogger Outreach We’re always looking to work with fun and engaging individuals who are passionate about our brand and mission. If you’re interested in learning more and applying to be a Stonyfield blogger or social media influencer, please fill out our short questionnaire. Directions to Yogurt Works & Plant Offices 10 Burton Drive, Londonderry, NH
